parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page. Pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of returned buckets. If this parameter is not specified, the default value is 10. The value cannot be greater than 100.

parameters.name: Prefix
parameters.description: Specifies the prefix that returned bucket names must contain. If this parameter is not specified, prefix information will not be used as a filter.
